definitions.definition: an act of exchanging something for money:
examples: The sale of cigarettes/alcohol is forbidden.

definitions.definition: the department of a company that organizes and does the selling of the company's products or services:

examples: Sales this year exceeded the total for the two previous years.

definitions.definition: an occasion when things are sold in order to make money:
available to buy in a shop:
examples: On sale at record stores now.

definitions.definition: a system by which goods are supplied to shopsand can be returned if they are not sold within a particular period of time:
examples: We can supply goods on a sale or return basis.
